tweet: Carrie, Miranda, Samantha and Charlotte appear to have cotton wool where their brains used to be. Culturally ignorant, staggeringly shallow.
Carrie is a successful writer of a certain age - as is abundantly clear - and yet she has never heard of a "souk".
When mothers meet, they talk about motherhood. A lot. Miranda and Charlotte having their first honest chat about kids? Don't buy it.
Samantha has been reduced to a talking vagina.
Carrie is positively nasty to Big when he buys her an extravagant present. These two don't seem to care about each other's feelings.
